analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component rendering a calendar/date SVG icon with a customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable date/calendar icon throughout the application’s UI, allowing color customization via props.

Components.name: IconDate
Components.responsibility: Renders an inline SVG representing a calendar/date icon and exposes a `fill` prop for color customization.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines component props in the `<script setup>` context.

Dependencies: CSS variable `--black` (used in default fill value)
analysis.Usage: Import and register (or use in `<script setup>`) the component: `import IconDate from 'modules/icons/entities/IconDate.vue'`, then place `<IconDate fill="#FF0000" />` in your template.
Notes: No dedicated `<style>` block—styling is handled via inline SVG attributes and CSS variables.
Uses Vue 3 Composition API `<script setup>` syntax for lightweight and type-inferred props.
SVG viewBox 0 0 48 48 and width/height 48px ensure consistent sizing across use cases.
